name: Ignition (itch) (vlxedits)
description:
I am selling a game I made by myself in visual studio . It's called Ignition.

In the game, you are a circle that hover around a bigger circle. You are supposed to press space when you hover over the red line. If you do, you gain a scorepoint, and the red line moves clockwise. This keeps looping until you reach score 26, where the game ends. You can replay it as much as you want. 

Preview:


It costs one dollar. It took me a little while to make. I programmed it in visual studio using SFML and C++. 

I made the app with the goal to inspire or 'rev up' people.

Possible additions I could have added would be a screen shake or 3d effect to make it more intense.

Thanks for considering my game.
